attributes.action: Continue to fund our National Wildlife Crime Unit
attributes.additional_details:
Funding MUST continue for this unit of 8 people to continue the fight against illegal activities both domestically and internationally.

Please keep funding in place and protect it against future government cuts.

Money runs out in 5 weeks time. You must act now. It cannot and should not be disbanded.  We pay the tax, we vote it is used to fund our National Wildlife Crime Unit.
attributes.background:
Other units around the world rely on intelligence gathered by NWCU to stop the ivory trade, egg smuggling etc.

No NWCU & criminals will have free rein to poach, bait, shoot, trap, smuggle, torment & exploit British wildlife. Police will lose a valuable resource for their Wildlife Crime Units.
